name: Stoney
description:
Stoney is a game made for Polish game jam #zostanwdomurobgry (which means #stayhomemakegames). 

It is survival game, where you are playing as little stone, who tries to restore the forest he lives in. During the gameplay, you will plant trees, collect resources and upgrade your house.

Controls:

  • WASD - walk
  • LPM - attack
  • PPM - use item
  • Space - jump
